adHeader: Steel, Aluminum and Stainless Welding and Fabrication
adDetails: I'm building up a small welding business and am looking for any type of work, large or small. I do have the ability to weld in almost and location with hundreds of feet of extension cords and numerous generators. I will charge around $50 to $100 per hour for steel work, $75 to $150 for aluminum and Stainless depending on job type. These prices will change with job size and location. I have the ability to both repair and strengthen old metals and also to fabricate new items. I can work any time of day but extremely early jobs may be slightly more expensive. I can weld 1/8in to 1/2in thick steel and can promise professional welds or money back. Contact at show contact info) call or text
